entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. 30 percent chance of flurries over northern sections this morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:38 AM PST Tuesday 07 March 2023
